EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2019.Reg Conf
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering.
We look forward to seeing you at SpringOne Platform.
Date: October 7–10, 2019 Location: Austin Convention Center, Austin, TX
Remember to book your room.
With SpringOne Platform occurring during the week between both weekends of Austin City Limits, rooms are getting snapped up.
Hilton, Austin $269/night (until Aug 23) 500 East 4th St. (0.2 miles away) book room <[[https://book.passkey.com/event/49823770/owner/11913/home]]>
Fairmont, Austin $309/night (until Aug 23) 101 Red River St. (0.1 miles away) book room <[[https://book.passkey.com/event/49753063/owner/15641008/home]]>
JW Marriott, Austin $309/night (until Aug 23) 110 East 2nd St. (0.3 miles away) book room <[[https://book.passkey.com/gt/217015277?gtid=4fb17d987651a89209db0b5f229fbb6d]]>
